Logging with default category
[Logging]

Logging macros with the default category. More...

Defines

#define EV   EV_INFO
#define EV_FATAL   OPP_LOG(LOGLEVEL_FATAL, NULL)
#define EV_ERROR   OPP_LOG(LOGLEVEL_ERROR, NULL)
#define EV_WARN   OPP_LOG(LOGLEVEL_WARN, NULL)
#define EV_INFO   OPP_LOG(LOGLEVEL_INFO, NULL)
#define EV_DETAIL   OPP_LOG(LOGLEVEL_DETAIL, NULL)
#define EV_DEBUG   OPP_LOG(LOGLEVEL_DEBUG, NULL)
#define EV_TRACE   OPP_LOG(LOGLEVEL_TRACE, NULL)

Detailed Description

Logging macros with the default category.

Category is a string that refers to the topic of the log message. The macro can be used as a C++ stream. Example: EV_DETAIL << "Connection setup complete" << endl;.

See also:
OPP_LOG, LogLevel, EV_STATICCONTEXT
